009package Ch17_EdgePreserving_Smoothing;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
014
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.PeronaMalikF.ColorMode;
021import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.PeronaMalikF.Parameters;
022import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.PeronaMalikFilterScalar;
023import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.PeronaMalikFilterVector;
024import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.IjProgressBarMonitor;
027import imagingbook.common.util.progress.ProgressMonitor;
028import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
029
030/**
031 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the Perona-Malik filter [1]. See Sec. 17.3 of [2] for additional details.
032 * This plugin works for all types of images and stacks.
033 * <p>
034 * [1] Pietro Perona and Jitendra Malik, "Scale-space and edge detection using anisotropic diffusion", IEEE Transactions
035 * on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence, vol. 12, no. 4, pp. 629-639 (July 1990).
036 * <br>
037 * [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
038 * (2022).
039 * </p>
040 *
041 * @author WB
042 * @version 2022/12/12
043 * @see PeronaMalikFilterScalar
044 * @see PeronaMalikFilterVector
045 */
046public class Perona_Malik_Filter implements PlugInFilter {
047
048        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
049        private boolean isColor;
050
051        /**
052         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
053         */
054        public Perona_Malik_Filter() {
055                if (noCurrentImage()) {
056                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Postcard2c);
057                }
058        }
059
060        @Override
061        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
062                return DOES_ALL;
063        }
064
065        @Override
066        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
067                isColor = (ip instanceof ColorProcessor);
068                
069                if (!runDialog())
070                        return;
071                
072                GenericFilter filter = null;
073                if (isColor) {
074                        filter = (params.colorMode == ColorMode.SeparateChannels) ?
075                                        new PeronaMalikFilterScalar(params) : 
076                                        new PeronaMalikFilterVector(params);
077                }
078                else {
079                        filter = new PeronaMalikFilterScalar(params);
080                }
081                
082                try (ProgressMonitor m = new IjProgressBarMonitor(filter)) {
083                        filter.applyTo(ip);
084                }
085        }
086        
087        private boolean runDialog() {
088                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
089                addToDialog(params, gd);
090                
091                gd.showDialog();
092                if (gd.wasCanceled())
093                        return false;
094                
095                getFromDialog(params, gd);
096                return params.validate();
097        }
098}
099
